## Collaborators

The lab maintains active and extensive research collaborations with:  
[Joshua Cashaback](https://joshcashaback.weebly.com/) | Department of Biomedical Engineering, University of Delaware  
[Brad Mckay](https://bradmckay-motor-meta.netlify.app/) | Milwaukee Brewers  
[Jonathan Cannon](https://metre.mcmaster.ca/) | Department of Psychology, Neuroscience, and Behaviour, McMaster University  

Some of our other collaborators include:  
[Keith Lohse](https://sites.google.com/site/lohsekr/) | Department of Neurology, Washington University School of Medicine in Saint Louis  
[Matthew Miller](http://www.education.auburn.edu/initiatives/performance-exercise-psychophysiology-lab-pep-matt-miller-ph-d/) | School of Kinesiology, Auburn University  
[Mariane Bacelar](https://www.boisestate.edu/kinesiology/faculty-and-staff-mariane-bacelar-phd/) | Department of Kinesiology, Boise State University
